title: Chief PPP visits Dhoki’s residence
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 08 (APP):Chairman Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP) Bilawal Bhutto Zardari visited the residence of his Chief Media Coordinator, late Nazir Hussain Dhoki to condole with the family.
Bilawal Bhutto Zardari offered Fatiha for his Chief Media Coordinator and prayed for strength and fortitude for the bereaved family to bear this irreparable loss with equanimity, said a news release.
Chairman PPP said that the Bhutto family has strong links with the Dhoki family for three generations. Nazir Dhoki also worked with Shaheed Mohtarma Benazir Bhutto and his demise is a great tragedy for the party.
The services of Nazir Hussain Dhoki for the Bhutto family will never be forgotten. He said that a great vacuum has been created in the party by his death which will be very difficult to fill.
Senator Farhatullah Babar and Jameel Soomro also accompanied Chairman PPP.
